resources.string: The following is a Quiz Game. You will be asked 5 questions, a mix of multiple choice and multiple answers, choose the correct answer(s) for each. When you are ready click next to proceed to the game
Question#1: Which one of the following is not a relational operator. Only one answer
Question#2: Which of these teams is in the AL East division. Pick two answers
Question#3: How many rings are there in the Olympic flag
Question#4: How did Spider-Man get his powers
Question#5: What are the colors of the Spanish flag
